game_description: Fake Racing is an indie racing game with an unusual visual style. Features: - The monochrome pixelized renderer was created specifically for this game. It uses a custom 3D-dithering shading technique to achieve a retro visual style with one of the three available monochrome palettes. - Fake car physics. Non-realistic but fun for casual play. - Attack from the Air: compete not only against your opponents, but also against the enemy helicopter. This mode creates an extra challenge for the race leaders, making the race more intense. - Four tracks with reverse and mirror options. Game modes: - Attack from the air; - Elimination; - Classic race.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Russian, Russian (Ukraine), Spanish (Spain)
